Installation Guide¶

This guide provides step-by-step instructions on how to set up and run the CSR Report Data Processing System.

## Prerequisites Before proceeding, ensure you have installed: - Python 3.9+ - Docker & Docker Compose - Poetry (for package management) - Git

## Step 1: Clone the Repository Clone the project from GitHub: .. code-block:: bash

git clone https://github.com/iftucl/ift_coursework_2024.git cd ift_coursework_2024/team_Ginkgo

## Step 2: Install Dependencies Use Poetry to install all required dependencies: .. code-block:: bash

poetry install

## Step 3: Set Up the Database Ensure PostgreSQL is running, then create the required database schema and tables: .. code-block:: bash

poetry run python database.py

## Step 4: Configure Environment Variables Modify config.py to set up your: - Google API Key - Database Credentials - MinIO Credentials

## Step 5: Start the System Run the following command to start all services: .. code-block:: bash

docker-compose up –build -d

## Step 6: Verify Installation To check if everything is set up correctly, run: .. code-block:: bash

poetry run python main.py
